Author: snakepack
Text: im going through the same thing but i'm not halfway through high school yet. if u ever need anyone to relate to / rant to / whatever, don't hesitate to reach out to me â™¡ u'll get through this

Author: karentakethekids
Text: Fuck, this sounds rly hard to get trough but i am glad you are still here. I kinda went trough the same thing (isolating myself due to depression, selfharming in all the ways i can etc..) and i hated myself for wasting so much time with selfloathing so i ended up going really hard during my last semester of highschool were i would constantly attend parties n force myself to socialize. Idk if it was worth it, i should have just probably reached out for help. Anyways, i hope you will get better, remember recovery is always possible. Stay save
